'''Sean Patrick Astin''' is an American actor, serving since 2025 as president of the {{Wikipedia|SAG-AFTRA}}. Within the industry, he is known for portraying [https://goonies.fandom.com/wiki/Michael_Walsh Mikey Walsh] in ''{{Wikipedia|The Goonies}}'' and {{Wikipedia|Samwise Gamgee}} in ''{{Wikipedia|The Lord of the Rings (film series)|The Lord of the Rings}}'' trilogy. On top of being a prolific screen actor, he has also had many roles as a voice actor, voicing {{Wikipedia|Raphael (Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles)|Raphael}} in the 2012 iteration of ''{{Wikipedia|Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2012 TV series)|Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles}}'' and the title character of ''{{Wikipedia|Special Agent Oso}}''.

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
In 2016, Astin provided the voice of the character {{MCSM|Reginald}} in {{MCSM}}, serving as a one-off supporting character.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/lords-of-the-rings-actor-sean-astin-joins-minecraf/1100-6435910/|title=Lords of the Rings Actor Sean Astin Joins Minecraft Story Mode in New Chapter|author=Eddie Makuch|website=Gamespot|date=March 22, 2016}}</ref> He would return in the 2020s, providing [[Audiobook narrators|narration]] for the audiobooks of two novels, ''[[Minecraft: The Mountain]]'' and ''[[Minecraft: The Village]]''.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.audible.com/pd/Minecraft-The-Mountain-Audiobook/0593393864?source_code=AUDORWS0718179KY7|title=Minecraft: The Mountain|website=Audible}}</ref><ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.audible.com/pd/Minecraft-The-Village-Audiobook/B0BKQYV2WC|title=Minecraft: The Village|website=Audible}}</ref><ref>{{YouTube link|R8dU3qdKNdU|Minecraft: The Village: An Official Minecraft… by Max Brooks · Audiobook preview|Google Play Books|January 27, 2024}}</ref>

== Trivia ==
* One of the characters he portrayed, [https://strangerthings.fandom.com/wiki/Bob_Newby Bob Newby] from the television series ''{{Wikipedia|Stranger Things}}'', would receive an official skin in the [[Stranger Things Skin Pack]].
** Another role of his, Raphael, would also later gain a skin in the [[Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles]] world, albeit not the version that he voiced. Instead, the iteration featured is based off the ''{{Wikipedia|Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987 TV series)|1987 series}}'', where he was portrayed by voice actor {{Wikipedia|Rob Paulsen}}.
*Astin went to high school with [[Max Brooks]] and [[Jack Black]], which led to him being assigned the audiobooks for the former's books; Jack Black had narrated the audiobook for [[Minecraft: The Island|''Minecraft: The Island'']].<ref>{{Mcnet|the-mountain|The Mountain|March 2, 2021|Alex Wiltshire}}</ref><ref>{{Citation|url=https://reactormag.com/max-brooks-minecraft-sean-astin-audiobook/|title=High School Buddies Max Brooks and Sean Astin Climb Minecraft: The Mountain Together|author=Molly Templeton|website=Reactor|date=February 23, 2021}}</ref>
